<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Breath Like Honey](/Feats.aspx?ID=2800) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gnoll" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=219" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 113 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Sweetbreath Gnoll](/Heritages.aspx?ID=168) heritage

</column>

---

You smell of honey and savory things. You can cast [_enthrall_](/Spells.aspx?ID=104) as a 3rd-level occult innate spell once per day, except the spell has a range of 30 feet and the [inhaled](/Traits.aspx?ID=96) trait instead of the [auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16) trait. Targets don't gain any circumstance bonus for disagreeing with you. Your circumstance bonus to checks to [Make an Impression](/Actions.aspx?ID=50) if the target can smell your breath increases to +2.
name: Breath Like Honey
